short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides furigana on the NHK easy news unless the user is hovering over the related kanji.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension modifies the CSS on https://www3.nhk.or.jp/news/easy/ to hide furigana unless the user is hovering over the related kanji. This allows a reader to try and recall the reading of the kanji without the hiragana being directly above it.
